name: BITTERSWEET POISON by Christoph - Bidders Edition

metadata.name: Hasta Que La Muerte Los Separe #1/21
metadata.description:
**Hasta Que La Muerte Los Separe**

"Until death separates them". "This is an illusion?" I wondered every time the last light of the day disappeared and the first sign of darkness of the night loomed, while you were the companion of my ship that navigated a sea of illusions... You were as cold and sharp as a razor, darling, we could be free...
